Barbarian King.name: Barbarian King
Barbarian King.abilityDescription: Partially heals, summons Barbarians, increases damage and movement speed for duration

Archer Queen.name: Archer Queen
Archer Queen.abilityDescription: Makes her invisible, recovers HP, summons Archers, increases attack speed. She retargets after ability ends.

Grand Warden.name: Grand Warden
Grand Warden.abilityDescription: Makes all nearby troops invincible for a short duration
Grand Warden.passiveAbilityDescription: Passively boosts HP of nearby troops by a percentage

Royal Champion.name: Royal Champion
Royal Champion.abilityDescription: Throws shield that bounces between 4 defense targets, partially heals herself

Minion Prince.name: Minion Prince
Minion Prince.abilityDescription: Recovers health. Amount increases every 5 levels. Ability can be used once per battle.
Minion Prince.equipmentSlot1Description: Summons a pair of Henchmen, provides brief invisibility, grants increased health recovery
Minion Prince.equipmentSlot2Description: Launches an ice crystal that damages and slows enemy targets in its path
